website_summaries.verdict: It's expensive, but with an 82-inch screen, you're going to really appreciate the QLED technology.
pros: Gives you all of the top-of-the-line features in a large screen television, including 4K resolution, a 240 hertz refresh rate, smart TV functionality, and WiFi connectivity
Comes with several HDMI and USB ports
Ambient Mode lets you personalize the screen when the TV show is over
cons: An 82-inch screen is probably more than many people need

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY!!!
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT BUY THIS TV. Six weeks after purchasing, totally quit working. Now six weeks after contacting Samsung, still no resolution in sight. We have always liked Samsung products, however when warranty or service in needed, they ABSOLUTELY fail in customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Middle Sister

customer_reviews.title: 82"  Samsung Qled TV
customer_reviews.text: This TV has awsome color and picture. It's easy to set up, connect other equipment.
customer_reviews.author: Michael  Linton

customer_reviews.title: Amazing picture!  82 inches.
customer_reviews.text: 82 inches. Brilliant picture. Black level seems to be slightly less than desirable in the factory setting. Decrease brightness to -1 to -3. You get perfect black level. Increase backlight to full strength. Keep noise control auto, then turn off all other smoothing (soap opera) effects. You will witness what picture perfect means. The picture is so vivid. I can see so much detail even in cartoons. The backlight evenness is not perfect, but fairly acceptable and not noticeable once movie starts. Great buy! QLED rocks!
customer_reviews.author: James Choi

customer_reviews.title: Great quality; heavy tv!
customer_reviews.text: Too heavy to mount on wall. We hired pros for the install and used all the recommended accessories. The television is simply too heavy for most walls. We’re disappointed, but everything else about the picture, sound, and ease of use has been great.
customer_reviews.author: Erin F.

customer_reviews.title: Another Samsung large LED TV picture problem.
customer_reviews.text: Great TV with a great picture when there are no problems. After 50 days this TV started showing a edge to edge line halfway up the screen. This the second of three large Samsung LED TVs that has failed soon after purchase. The good news is it looks like Samsung will fix or replace this set. What a pain. That makes a 66% failure rate. The Samsung repair team showed up today. Within 1 hour they changed the screen on my 82 inch qled TV that had a bad pixel. Professional and polite is how I would describe them. Life is good again.
customer_reviews.author: ZDog

customer_reviews.title: Great Picture
customer_reviews.text: This TV has a great picture with most of the stuff I watch. If you have a decent feed you get a great picture. Old stuff not as good. I replaced a newer 75" Vizio with this and the picture is better even with the larger screen. The set is costly no doubt but I think worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Gary J. Kubis

customer_reviews.title: A TV that will literally change your life. Look no further.
customer_reviews.text: This is the most spectacular TV I've ever owned. The picture quality is unreal; or actually very lifelike. The speakers are plenty loud enough without a sound bar, plus the sound options where you can optimize the sound is fun to play around with. The smart features are intuitive to use and it is so easy to link your YouTube, Amazon Prime, Netflix, and Hulu accounts to the TV. Another feature I love is that it shows (when you switch to satellite/cable mode) the popular TV shows being viewed currently. I scored mad brownie points with my hubby for getting this for him for Christmas. :)
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Very good size and good picture
customer_reviews.text: I use it movies and for gaming. There's some issues with the "smartness" of the TV HDMIs... sometimes It will turn off my xbox after I already turned on as soon as a set the xbox input just to mention one. The TV is great but I'm giving 3 starts because I had to return mine. One dead red pixel appeared in the middle of the screen in less than a month. Not sure If many come like that or I was just very unlucky... but thanks to that I'm without TV for a week until I get a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Super clear picture and great UI - but silver bevel???
customer_reviews.text: This is a great TV, probably the best we have ever owned. The 82" screen is massive and crystal clear, and the bevel, is thin. That bevel is my only complaint: it is silver! It should be black, why in the world would you want something that reflects light right up against your television?? Not everybody watches TV in a black room with no lights at all behind them. Such a little but obvious thing that takes a bit of enjoyment from what would be a perfect TV. The standard above-average Smart TV UI from Samsung is here, which is a plus.
customer_reviews.author: Samwell

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful picture!!!
customer_reviews.text: The colors are so vivid and picture is so crisp. The one downside which kept me from giving it a 5-star review is the inability to connect the sound bar with tv. The sound bar has its own remote rather than having the ability to attach it to our main controller. The speakers for the tv are in the back or the tv and sound quality from tv alone is that good. If there is something I am doing wrong , and there is a way to connect soundbar to main remote, I would like to know.
customer_reviews.author: P. B. Moore

customer_reviews.title: Television display  failed after 14 months.  Warranty is 12 months.
customer_reviews.text: I have now purchased 4 Samsung televisions in the last 18 months. The 82 inch TV for which I am writing this review lasted 14 months before the display failed. A service center quoted me $4000 to repair it. The warranty was 12 months. A second Samsung television failed after 13 months but was a far less expensive 55 inch television. I am not sure if Samsung's now have quality issues, but I seem to get the sense from friends that they do. I could not be more disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Kite / Workuity

customer_reviews.title: New (?) but delivered without a box!
customer_reviews.text: Something was seriously wrong with this experience. Very expensive tv delivered without a box. Was damaged and screen broken (as you can see from the picture -- that's what it looked like when plugged in). I have never seen an electronics product of this type delivered without a box. It would have been a miracle if it were not damaged!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: different TV
customer_reviews.text: my freind’s Samsung tv quality was superb so i bought same one Amazon where my general experience was goood however deliveredTV was republished and differnt screen size son returned.
customer_reviews.author: yh

customer_reviews.title: Would not buy again
customer_reviews.text: Developed a line of dead pixels and substantial light bleed just after warranty period ended. I will go with another brand next time.
customer_reviews.author: Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: It is very big, but great.
customer_reviews.text: The instructions are lacking, and we have had it 3 weeks. We are just getting kind of used to the technology. Being born in the 40's, it's hard.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Lund

customer_reviews.title: Never seen a better picture!  Tons of great features and....it’s huge!
customer_reviews.text: It’s Fantastic! Huge TV with a picture so clear you can see individual stubble hair on characters faces. It almost looks 3D at all times. Picture adjusts to the light in the room to improve visibility. Can connect my laptop screen wirelessly to the tv as well. Friends are coming to our house to rent movies instead of going to the theatre. LOVE THIS TV!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing picture quality
customer_reviews.text: Watching Blue Earth 2 in 4k ultrahd nearly makes you feel the salt spray. The blacks are not as dark as an OLED screen but I would have had to get a second mortgage to buy an 82" OLED. I love that the TV monitors the connected inputs, turns itself on when it detects activity on that input, and sets the source automatically.
customer_reviews.author: M Spurling

customer_reviews.title: Good Picture
customer_reviews.text: We looked at a bunch of TVs in a side by side comparison. The QLED picture was the winner in the quality per dollar so we are very glad it's now hanging on our Living Room Wall
customer_reviews.author: Ed B

customer_reviews.title: Great picture
customer_reviews.text: Everything working great, don't understand why Samsung would not include HDMI cable in the package,doesn't make any senses at all . Other than that, it's a great product. My reason for 3 stars
customer_reviews.author: Babatope

customer_reviews.title: great TV fast delivery no customer service from samsung
customer_reviews.text: customer service bad.tried to call no answer.tried online no answer.guess we are on our own.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Bowe

customer_reviews.title: after 18 months, there is a line across the bottom of picture
customer_reviews.text: it was great for 18 months, i expected it to last longer. Disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy NYC

customer_reviews.title: Screen is garbage,cheap insides
customer_reviews.text: Screen shot in 4months, black bar going on right side, sound selection changes on its own. Going to be difficult to replace but at least i bought warranty
customer_reviews.author: Kmboland

customer_reviews.title: Samsung TV
customer_reviews.text: What a spectacular TV. The quality it amazing. It arrived when it was supposed to. I’m very happy with the quality
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the FLB
customer_reviews.text: Looked huge when it was delivered in the box! Once wall mounted in our 20x35ft gathering room it was perfect. Picture is great, Paired with 7.1 surround sound it delivers the true home theater experience.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing TV
customer_reviews.text: Amazing TV. I’ve had it for over a month and no complains
customer_reviews.author: Charles

customer_reviews.title: Very Good so far
customer_reviews.text: For the most part the TV is very good, clearly a huge picture. When watching TV, it sometime does not seem to load fast enough so pixels can be seen briefly.
customer_reviews.author: TOB

customer_reviews.title: Awesome tv
customer_reviews.text: this tv is everything I wanted it’s big it’s bright and has all the smart features. I have the 82 inch model and I would recommend to others who are lookin for a large tv that isn’t crazy expensive.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice big TV
customer_reviews.text: Love this TV. Only giving 4 stars as the first one had some dead pixels but Amazon replaced it and the new one is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob Sordelet

customer_reviews.title: great price for features
customer_reviews.text: This TV is a great price for the features, deeply discounted as the new year TV's are coming out and this model is not one of them. I am very happy with it, incredibly easy to use smart features and set up as well.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Hetzel

customer_reviews.title: WOW!!!
customer_reviews.text: I'm extremely impressed thus far. The picture quality is amazing. Absolute blacks make the contrast the best I've seen. The remote is very intuitive. Very happy I chose this model. YOLO!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Big and nice
customer_reviews.text: No problems best picture I have ever had wonderful tv
customer_reviews.author: Bobby E Singleton

customer_reviews.title: Great TV
customer_reviews.text: It is great with movies and TV shows love the Quality
customer_reviews.author: O.M.

customer_reviews.title: Everything is just as advertised
customer_reviews.text: We were not disappointed in the product or the delivery.
customer_reviews.author: Roxanne M.

product_meta.title: Samsung QN82Q6 Flat 82" QLED 4K UHD 6 Series Smart TV 2018
product_meta.description: The eye will savor the 2018 Q6. Welcome to the prestigious QLED lineup that tantalizes your vision with 1 billion+ shades of Q Color while Ambient Mode alters the screen into a spectacular visual display. See colors in movies and shows pop, just as the director intended, in stunning high dynamic range. QLED TVs meet the highest 4K Ultra High-Definition standards as defined by the Consumer Electronics Association (CEA). Burn-in is when station logos, stock tickers, or other images linger on your screen. But, with Samsung QLED TVs you don't have to worry because all QLED TVs are 100% guaranteed against burn-in. Meet Bixby, your intelligent voice assistant in your new 2018 QLED TV. Bixby makes it easy to search for content, flip channels, or even ask questions such as the current weather using only your voice. Just click voice recognition on your remote or mobile, and Bixby is at your command. Have several smart devices to manage? No problem. Simply download SmartThings App on your mobile to control and monitor your new QLED TV and connected devices all in one screen!
feature_bullets: Product Dimensions: With Stand 72" W x 45.1" H x 15.2" D | Without Stand 72" W x 41.5" D x 2.4" H
Q Contrast: Experience dramatic depth from the darkest to brightest scenes.
Q HDR: See colors in movies and shows pop, just as the director intended, in stunning high dynamic range.
Q Style: A thoughtful design with a clean cable solution allows you to focus on a TV without the clutter.

Ambient Mode: With our new Ambient Mode, you can elevate your living room with decorative content, useful information, your own photos, and even some background music. You won’t notice the TV on the wall as it blends perfectly with your décor.
Smart TV with Bixby Voice: A revolutionary way to help find streaming and live TV shows with a universal guide, OneRemote and voice assistance.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.0 out of 5 stars97 ratings4.0 out of 5 stars
